A. Appendix: Dates of Systemic Financial Crises, 1870Ã¢â¬â2011 The crisis prediction classification models in the paper employ data on all systemic financial crises from 1870 to 2011. Dates of systemic financial crises based on Jord` a, Schularick, and Taylor (2011) and Schularick and Taylor (2012), sources therein, and updates. See text. AUS stands for Australia, BEL for Belgium, CAN for Canada, CHE for Switzerland, DEU for Germany, DNK for Denmark, ESP for Spain, FIN for Finland, FRA for France, GBR for the U.K., ITA for Italy, JPN for Japan, NLD for The Netherlands, NOR for Norway, PRT for Portugal, SWE for Sweden, USA for the United States.
